class.name: VisualShaderNodeTransformFunc
class.brief_description: Computes a [Transform] function within the visual shader graph.
class.description: Computes an inverse or transpose function on the provided [Transform].

members.member: The function to be computed. See [enum Function] for options.

constants.constant: Perform the inverse operation on the [Transform] matrix.
Perform the transpose operation on the [Transform] matrix.
